PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Pros --------------------------------------------- S-tier mapping, exceptional clear Scales well as a Physical Skill Freeze is insanely good for safety Fast Reap has higher damage upside if you are willing to boss swap gems and push an extra button Very high damage ceiling, 100-400m dps with investment If you DONT want to use Reap, you can skip it entirely and still boss after a certain investment level
Cons --------------------------------------------- Gem swapping for bossing (if you don't care about bossing, ignore this) Reap requires additional sockets to acquire Blood charges with a second copy of Reap Reap requires an extra button Reap has a large life cost
Vendor Regex --------------------------------------------- "b-b-b|g-g-r|g-[gr]-g|r-g-g|Runn|rint|me Sh"
Leveling --------------------------------------------- Level off the beach with ^x70FF70Cobra Lash^7 until Level 4 / Hillock
New stuff highlighted in ^xFFFF77Yellow^7.
TO SIMULATE THE NEW GEM PRE-3.27 LAUNCH - Use ^x7070FFWave of Conviction^7 for Fire Exposure
^xD02090^x7070FFLevel 4: ^7^7 ^xFFFF77Rolling Magma + Elemental Proliferation^7 ^xFFFF77Flame Wall^7 ^xFFFF77Frostblink + Arcane Surge^7 (^xD02090DON'T LEVEL ARCANE SURGE PAST 1^7)
NOTE: ^x8888FFArcane Surge^7 was buffed in 3.26 to provide a flat 20% cast speed and 30% mana regen at all levels, and when linked with Frostblink (or any skill) will proc constantly. Cast Speed is a multiplier for your damage but more importantly, makes Rolling Magma feel less bad on a non-caster. ^xE05030This will dramatically improve your quality of life^7. If you have the socket just keep it linked with Frostblink as it will reduce your mana costs as you campaign by boosting the effectiveness of Clarity.
^xD02090^x7070FFLevel 8:^7^7 Rolling Magma + Elemental Proliferation + ^xFFFF77Combustion^7 Flame Wall ^xFFFF77Bear Trap^7 Frostblink + Arcane Surge (Still level 1 Arcane Surge) ^xFFFF77Shield Charge + Momentum + Faster Attacks^7 ^xFFFF77Clarity^7
^xD02090^x7070FFLevel 16:^7^7 Rolling Magma + Elemental Proliferation + Combustion Flame Wall ^xFFFF77Summon Skitterbots^7 Frostblink + Arcane Surge (Still level 1 Arcane Surge) Shield Charge + Momentum + Faster Attacks Clarity ^xFFFF77IMPORTANT: Go buy Exsanguinate + Reap gems to level in your offhand^7
^x8888FF^x7070FFBandits:^7^7 Take ^xFFFF77Alira^7, it's so much more comfortable in campaign than the other two.
^xD02090^x7070FFLevel 31:^7^7 ^xE05030Run Library for Charged Mines^7, ^xE05030gamble for a 4L^7 ^xFFFF77Pyroclast Mines + Swift Assembly + Added Cold Damage + Charged Mines^7 ^xFFFF77Automation + Detonate Mines^7 Bear Trap Summon Skitterbots Frostblink + Arcane Surge (Still level 1 Arcane Surge) Shield Charge + Momentum + Faster Attacks Clarity ^xFFFF77Flammability^7 ^xFFFF77Grace^7
^x7070FF^xD02090^x7070FF1st Ascendency:^7 ^xD02090Swift Killer^7^7^7
^xFFFF77Bench flat fire damage to spells on a weapon^7
^xD02090^x7070FFLevel 38:^7^7 Pyroclast Mines + ^xFFFF77Minefield^7 + Added Cold Damage + Charged Mines^7 Automation + Detonate Mines Bear Trap Summon Skitterbots Frostblink + Arcane Surge (Still level 1 Arcane Surge) Shield Charge + Momentum + Faster Attacks Clarity Flammability^7 Grace^7
^xD02090^x7070FFLevel 55:^7^7 Pyroclast Mines + Minefield + ^xFFFF77Elemental Focus ^7+ Charged Mines^7 Automation + Detonate Mines Flame Wall Bear Trap Summon Skitterbots Frostblink + Arcane Surge (Still level 1 Arcane Surge) Shield Charge + Momentum + Faster Attacks Clarity Flammability^7 Grace^7 ^xFFFF77Guard Skill, probably Automation + Steelskin^7
^x7070FF^xE05030^xD02090^x7070FF2nd Ascendency:^7 ^xD02090Polymath^7^7^7^7 - respec starter nodes to acquire Masteries to make it worth
Add ^xFFFF77Enduring Cry^7 in early maps while waiting to source another Endurance Charge generator (Enduring Composure cluster -OR- Eldritch implicit)
^x7070FFEntering Maps:^7 -Gamble for 4L bases with Life/Res. In particular, find a good Eva/ES chest to boost defenses. -Consider buying ^xAF6025March of the Legion^7 (35-50% more damage for your 4L). This is a very common T5 unique and is not terribly expensive. -Vendor recipe a White wand (good base like Demon Horn or Imbued) with 40% quality combined gems tagged Fire for a free +1 gems wand. Augment. Regal. Bench %Increased Mine Throwing Speed. -Use an Essence of Zeal on a good belt base which gives a considerable amount of Mine Throwing Speed for cheap damage -Bench Mine Throwing Speed on your weapons / amulet ASAP -Fix your flasks, they are probably terrible. You probably want ^xE05030Ignite^7 immunity from a flask as I find this the most annoying damaging ailment. Get a ^x70FF70Jade^7 flask and ideally a flask with %inc evasion suffix.
Off-hand gems --------------------------------------------- Level ^xE05030Exsanguinate^7 in every offhand socket you have. You will want to corrupt them for a level 21 the moment you can, as every gem level is an important power jump. If you remember to do this early you won't have to wait as long later. ^xFFFF77Quality on the gem doesn't matter^7 as we are scaling the hit and not the DoT, don't feel obligated to quality them before corrupting for 21.
^xE05030Reap^7, however, ^xFFFF77we DO want quality^7 for as the additional damage per blood charge is substantial.
Endurance Charges^7 ------------------------------------------- These are a really excellent defensive layer and will be important. Get them from either an ^xE05030Enduring Composure^7 small cluster (probably what I will do) or from the ^xE05030Endurance Charge implicit^7 on chests. ^xE05030 Enduring Cry^7 is also an option but I personally hate additional buttons. Swift Killer will ensure that Enduring Composure keeps your charges up all the time, even on an evasion base.
^xFFFF77ASCENDENCY ORDER^7^7^7 ------------------------------------------- 1. Swift Killer 2. Polymath (respec your tree so you have enough masteries for it to be worth) 3. Escape Artist 4. Spellbreaker
^x7070FFCheap / Abundant Uniques^7 ------------------------------------------- ^xAF6025March of the Legion^7 is a massive damage buff to ^x7070FFPyroclast Mines^7 and is a T5 unique that effectively gives a psuedo 5L ^xAF6025Wyrmsign^7 is another very common 5L item, though it will reduce your clear some with ^x7070FFPyroclast Mines ^7^xAF6025Nycta's Lantern^7 is another strong cheap unique which gives Battlemage and a substantial chunk of flat phys and fire ^xAF6025Kintsugi^7 is amazing defensively and one of my favorite items, especially early ^xAF6025Restless Ward^7 is common and can be found with good corruptions for reasonably cheap. It provides substantial regen once you've sourced Endu charges and more movement speed
^x7070FFCritical Strike Chance^7^7 ------------------------------------------- Crit will be crucially important as it will gate your ability to Freeze and deal damage. I wouldn't transition over to ^xE05030Exsanguinate^7 unless you have Pob'd that you will be getting ^xFFFF77at least 70% crit chance^7 or you just won't be freezing enough. Early on take ^x8888FFWinter's Embrace^7 to make this more comfy. There are excellent Critical Strike medium clusters available for cheap to help, and you can take or annoint really strong Crit nodes like ^xADAA47High Voltage^7, bench or get gear with ^xFFFF77Increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells^7 (shield / caster weapons), ^x8888FFDiamond flasks^7 for conditional crit chance, Hatred Watcher's eye mods with base critical strike chance, ^x70FF70Assassin's Mark^7, and so on.
If you are having a hard time crit capping, use ^xAF6025Hrimsorrow^7 gloves and ^x8888FFIncreased Critical Strikes^7 support to ease the transition.
^x8888FFSupport Gem Choices^7 ---------------------------------------------------------- -Cold Penetration is an excellent option and doesn't have the throw delay that Trap and Mine imposes -Chain/Awakened Chain are great for clear. You might want the Chaining Range wheel (Trick Shot), but I don't personally find it necessary -Prioritize Crit Capping over more Crit Multi-- if you are low on crit chance you'll get more reliable freeze with Increased Critical Strikes
^x8888FFWays to get 2% CDR for the 0.198s mine detonation breakpoint^7 ^x8888FF^xC8C8C8----------------------------------------------------------^7^7 -2% CDR on Abyss Jewel -CDR on boot implicit -Generic Gem Levels will boost the CDR enough that you won't need it elsewhere (higher budget) -Enhance is great as it also gives Mine Detonation Speed
^xFFFF77IMPORTANT^7^7^7 ^xD02090Transitioning from Pyroclast Mines to Exsanguinate^7 ----------------------------------------------------------
Before transitioning you want to have acquired: - a 5-Link minimum - a level 18 Exsanguinate, ideally 20 or 21. gem levels are a massive amount of damage for spells. Quality doesnt matter. - Ideally the correct spell modifiers on gear (+1 gem on weapon, +1 gem or high spell dmg on shield, spell crit chance) - ^xAF6025Kikazaru^7 -OR- enough life regen that you don't kill yourself (250-300+) - 100% Physical Conversion to Cold. ^xAF6025Hrimsorrow^7 is great for this. Other options (more expensive) are Watcher's Eye, Betrayal gloves, glove implicit, and 40% from the Cold mastery. If you don't convert your damage to elemental Exsanguinate will do very little damage.
^xAF6025Heatshiver^7 is nice but might be expensive, not required.
^xFFFF77IMPORTANT^7^7 ^xD02090Skill Tree Transition to Exsanguinate ^7---------------------------------------------------------- You need Freeze Duration in order for Freeze to be an effective damage mitigation layer, particularly when you get to late maps. I've allocated^7 ^x7070FFWinter's Embrace^7 and Physical Conversion as part of the transition to Exsanguinate becuase ^xFFFF77YOU WANT^7 100% conversion to Cold for Cold damage to be effective. At lower damage levels, particularly right when you transition, you will want Freeze Duration.
^x8888FFFREEZE^7 - ^xFFFF77IMPORTANT^7 ------------------------------------------- Freeze is a critical thing to get right here or it will feel like dogshit to play. Freeze duration is calculated based on the size of the hit relative to the target's ailment threshhold, and as long as you are critting you will get Freezes guaranteed. You need a 0.3s Freeze for it not to be discarded, however you can get Freeze Duration from the tree (^x8888FFWinter's Embrace^7 and ^x8888FFElemental Focus^7^7) or from cluster jewels. If you aren't reliably freezing mobs path up to ^x7070FFWinter's Embrace^7 and take the whole wheel.
For example, to get the minimum 0.3s freeze on a mob you have to deal 5% of its health pool in a single hit. With 100% increased freeze duration (or ailment duration), you only have to deal 2.5% of its health pool to get the 0.3s freeze which is enough to proc Heatshiver for the next hit,
^x7070FFCrafting Basic Endgame Gear^7 ------------------------------------------- ^xFFFF77Necrotic Armours^7 - Source bases from your maps and Alt spam for T1 %inc Eva/ES+Stun and T1 flat Eva/ES. Recombinate those two mods only together, then bench 74% Increased Eva/ES and exalt suffixes to get the Chest in the PoB ^xFFFF77Weapons^7 - The easiest way to get good updates / low cost are to vendor recipe a combined 40% quality of skill gems with a Physical tag with a scoured weapon base (wand, rune dagger, etc). Then recombinate it with a T1 Essence of Woe -OR- Essence of Scorn depending on what your build needs. Then either multimod or just bench Mine Throwing Speed.
